children.text: Enough Said spoken word series event held at Bistro 4 (4040 St. Laurent, Montreal, QC, H2W 1Y8, Canada) on February 27, 1995, hosted by Lee Gotham. Feature performances by Fluffy Pagan Echoes. Open mic/supporting performances by Edith's Mission (Ibolya "Ibi"Kaslik and Amy Millan), Kate Alsterlund, Tom Chamberlain, and more.
